DataDomain Rest API Documentation
Alerts Notifylists
Show list of alerts notification lists
Show details of an alert notification list
Modify an alert notification list   Existing information will be replaced by new input
Modify an alert notification list   Existing information will be replaced by new input Copy

item.description:
*DataDomain Rest API Documentation  
Headers:   
Content-Type:application/json  
Accept:application/json  
X-DD-AUTH-TOKEN:{{X-DD-AUTH-TOKEN}}   
  
**Alerts Notifylists  
DELETE https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1  0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/alerts/notify-lists Delete all user-configured alert notification lists  
GET https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1  0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/alerts/notify-lists Show list of alerts notification lists  
POST https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1  0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/alerts/notify-lists Create an alert notification list  
DELETE https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1  0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/alerts/notify-lists/{ID} Delete an alert notification list  
GET https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1  0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/alerts/notify-lists/{ID} Show details of an alert notification list  
PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1  0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/alerts/notify-lists/{ID} Modify an alert notification list   Existing information will be replaced by new input

item.name: Comp Measurements

request.description:
If you do get a false back you need to enable Physical Capacity Measurement within the DD GUI  

otherwise enable on the DD CLI
compression physical-capacity-measurement enable [andinitialize]

item.description:
*DataDomain Rest API Documentation  
Headers:   
Content-Type:application/json  
Accept:application/json  
X-DD-AUTH-TOKEN:{{X-DD-AUTH-TOKEN}}   
  
**Comp Measurements  
DELETE https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Delete multiple compression measurements  
GET https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Get the list of compression measurement information  
POST https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Create a compression measurement   Note that maximum request size is 64k   Client needs to use PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} to add more inclue/exclude paths if the total include/exclude paths causes the whole request   exceed 64k  
PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Start multiple compression measurements  
DELETE https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} Delete a compression measurement, which is not completed    
GET https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} Get the detailed information of a specified compression measurement  
PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} Start this job or add more include and exclude paths to a compression measurement

*DataDomain Rest API Documentation  
Headers:   
Content-Type:application/json  
Accept:application/json  
X-DD-AUTH-TOKEN:{{X-DD-AUTH-TOKEN}}   
  
**Alerts Notifylists

PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/alerts/notify-lists/{ID} Modify an alert notification list   Existing information will be replaced by new input  
**Auth

POST /rest/v1.0/auth Create authentication token

**Comp Measurements  
DELETE https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Delete multiple compression measurements  
GET https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Get the list of compression measurement information  
POST https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Create a compression measurement   Note that maximum request size is 64k   Client needs to use PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} to add more inclue/exclude paths if the total include/exclude paths causes the whole request   exceed 64k  
PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements Start multiple compression measurements  
DELETE https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} Delete a compression measurement, which is not completed    
GET https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} Get the detailed information of a specified compression measurement  
PUT https://{{DD}}:3009/rest/v1.0/dd-systems/{{SYSTEM-ID}}/stats/compression/measurements/{ID} Start this job or add more include and exclude paths to a compression measurement  
**Comp Measurements Support Check
